resources.string:
You are about to start a journey of 100km+.


For your safety, ensure you check:


• The pressure of your tires 
• The engine oil level 
• The windshield wipers


You can find some information in the Vehicle tab on the homescreen.
You don\'t have the required permissions.
Please wait until the end of the loading
Failed to get your current location
You must have an active music player
I didn\'t understand. Can you repeat?
I am going to send an SMS to %s. What message would you like to send?
I understood the following message : %s. Would you like to send it?
I didn\'t understand. Would you like to send the message ? Say yes or no.
An error happened while saving your parking position.
New message from %s. Would you like to read it?
I didn\'t understand. Would you like to read the message? Say yes or no.
Here\'s the message : %s. Would you like to answer?
Position sharing disabled : permissions not granted
Cargo can read your notifications to vocally read your notifications and dynamically answer to them with your voice.
Please start the app to grand the required permissions.
Cargo can access your contacts to allow you to join them easily.
Enable the option for Cargo and press back
Cargo can use your location to start your journeys
Cargo can access your microphone to interact with your voice.
Cargo can read your notifications to interact with your messages and read you vocally your notifications.
Required. Cargo draws itself on top of your apps to be easily accessible.
You need to enable the option to continue
Cargo can send SMS thanks to the vocal control.
We hope you\'ll enjoy your trip with Cargo.

Welcome to Cargo.


Start a journey by tapping the icon in the lower right corner


Consult vehicles information by tapping the right tab


Enjoy the road, with Cargo.
I did not understand. Would-you like to reply? Say yes or no.
What message would you like to send?
Here\'s your sharing link. Share it with your loved ones so they can track your journey.
Track my journey with this anonymous and secure Cargo link : %s
